message: Let's divide fairly, I get a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
Come on, let's be reasonable, I'll lower my expectations a bit
Okay, how about a fair 50/50 split?  We both lose if this keeps going.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve a bit more
This is getting ridiculous.  Meet me in the middle at 48/52 and let's end this.
